Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
That perfect residence we all dream about but can never find, is finally on the market. Positive first impressions are assured with the striking facade providing great street appeal. Upon entering the chic and sophisticated interior will amaze and have you saying maybe, then the clincher will come once you reach the magnificent decked outdoor entertainment area complete with outdoor kitchen and feature deck seating that will just blow you away and have you screaming YES. The home offers everything you could ever wish for with 4 spacious bedrooms, 2 amazing recently updated bathrooms, a lovely modern kitchen that overlooks the dining and 2 living spaces, double remote garage and the added bonus of having a separate outbuilding in the rear that is currently being utilised as an office for those that prefer to work from home or can also be used as a sleepout, teenagers retreat or mancave. Be quick this one will not last long. Full list of features available upon inspection.
Insights: 79 Sherrington Grange, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Providing great street appeal this lovely Derrimut residence promises to be popular. Highlighted by 9 foot ceilings and high grade contemporary flooring this large home comprises central kitchen with stone benches, glass splashback and 900mm appliances that is encompassed by the dining, living, huge decked alfresco and formal lounge room. Sleeping accommodation consists of 4 spacious bedrooms, the master with ensuite and WIR whilst the 3 additional bedrooms are all of good size and are serviced by the main bathroom with spa. A laundry with direct access to outside, double remote garage with internal access and large blank canvas rear yard awaiting your imagination complete this highly desirable property. Other features include stone benches in bathrooms, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, decorative cornices and a superb location in a quiet family friendly street yet only a short stroll to everything that makes Derrimut so popular. This home screams value for money and provides some lovely features and upgrades with the potential of leaving a little room for you to put your own stamp and finishing touches that could take this already great home to the next level and make it truly something special.
Insights: 7 Blickling Avenue, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Stylishly Stirling!
This modern single-level unit presents an idyllic move-right-into scenario without you having to do another thing except unpack, arrange the furniture and immediately start enjoying the pristinely presented space and comfort on offer.
It has everything you need for a wonderful stress-free lifestyle including an open-plan living and meals area incorporating a fully equipped kitchen with an abundance of bench space, three bedrooms with built-in robes, master with walk in robe and full ensuite , a gleaming bathroom and a great sized laundry. Relax, unwind and entertain outside on the private garden rear garden that flows from the meals area or the private courtyard to the side of the home.
Making for a dressy downsizer, fantastic first home or intelligent investment, the home is located close to public transport, schools, shops, parks, Ballarat Road and the Western Freeway. Avoid disappointment book an inspection today!
Insights: 10A Stirling Drive, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
As Inviting as it is Impressive
Advantaged by a brilliant position just steps to schools, childcare and vast open parkland, the combination of captivating style and contemporary spaces delivers a significant lifestyle edge to this dazzling townhouse. Gorgeous natural light floods the lounge and study that head up a superb open floorplan flowing through to fabulous stone kitchen/dining domain backed by deck and the low-maintenance courtyard garden. Above, the main bedroom with sparkling ensuite perpetuates the outstanding sense of style, matched the beauty of natural northerly light and views over Balmoral Park, while two further bedrooms, bathroom and fabulous adaptable landing/living space complete the upper level. Split system heating/cooling and secure garaging plus open car space reached via the rear laneway further distinguish a home of undeniable appeal keeping buses, trains, local shopping precincts and the Western Freeway within grasp.
Insights: 67 Windsor Boulevard, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Move right in
Stop and look no further at this gorgeous home, ready for you to move right in. Inside this home you will find 4 generous sized bedrooms, the main bedroom is serviced by a sun filled en-suite and features a large walk in robe; all other bedrooms showcase built in robes and are serviced by a centrally located bathroom. The kitchen offers a huge amount of bench and cupboard space accompanied by quality stainless steel cooking appliances. With open plan living in mind, the kitchen overlooks the generous sized living area and the fully covered pergola area for year round entertaining. Quality furnishings and fittings included are ducted heating, high ceilings, floor boards throughout the home, double car garage and loads more.
Situated in the heart of Derrimut, the home is a only minutes away from schools, parks, public transport, Sunshine Golf Club, restaurants and Derrimut Village Shopping Centre
Call now to avoid disappointment!!

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
They say a picture speaks a 1000 words so I'll keep my description brief as the photos of this sensational park front property certainly show it to be something very special. By renowned builder Metricon, this award winning Byron design currently holds the record price for a single level residence in the suburb and is highlighted by a magnificent kitchen with butler's pantry, state of the art bathrooms and fantastic master bedroom with magnificent park views and amazing fitted WIR / changeroom that will more than satisfy the biggest shopaholic in the family. Complimenting these areas are multiple large living and entertaining zones all with lovely views of either the mature gardens or magnificent Bothwell Park. Huge bedrooms, contemporary flooring, high ceilings and a host of other luxurious features combine to present you with the opportunity to secure one of Derrimut's finest homes. Inspection highly recommended to appreciate exactly what is on offer. Please note all buyers will receive a full list of special features upon inspection.

Description:
Impressive Scale and Luxury
Located in one of Derrimut's most desired locations, this loved family home has everything you need from a home and more.
Sitting on approx. 586m2 of land and demanding your attention from the front with its striking and contemporary facade, you'll be hard pressed to find a home that has space and style of this calibre.
Contemporary in design and functionality, this stunning family home has glorious presentation which will captivate you with open spaces, flexible living arrangements and carefree lifestyle.
The endless living areas provide a vast array of living options and include formal lounge, large study, open meals/family area and separate rumpus room. Immaculate modern kitchen features dishwasher, stainless steel appliances, spacious pantry and plenty of storage options. Flowing outdoor alfresco areas are perfect for the avid entertainer and will provide year-round comfort as they progress into the fully landscaped garden. Gorgeous master bedroom with walk-in robe, stunning Ensuite and access to the large balcony. Upstairs also boasts 3 great size bedrooms with access to the stylish central bathroom and separate toilet.
Additional features include; ducted heating, 5 split systems, stone bench tops, an abundance of natural light throughout. Double garage with remote access and drive through access complete this already remarkable property.
Enjoying unlimited access to the estate facilities with schools, parks, shopping centres and freeway access all only moments away, this home is one that must be inspected for those looking for space, land and style.
Insights: 9 Eltham Glen, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Premium Home in Derrimut!
Quality display home offers 4 bedrooms and 1 study. The downstairs level is the heart of the home, with a formal lounge room and a 5th bedroom/study, a huge open plan with kitchen/dining/family room. This level also includes a toilet and spacious laundry with plenty of storage.
The large kitchen is perfect for busy families and for entertaining, with stone bench tops and stainless-steel appliances including an oven and rangehood. The kitchen also comes with a butlerâs pantry with loads of storage. Access to the cedar framed sliding doors in both the kitchen and dining area, the alfresco entertaining area with decking, down lights and ceiling fan invites you to enjoy the stunning natural setting around you.
Upstairs youâll find 4 spacious bedrooms and a large leisure area. Master bedroom with full ensuite also has doors to a balcony where you can soak up the sun. The home has a large beauty salon setup. Some of the homeâs many features include heating, cooling, display heater in the family room, timber flooring and an alarm system.
Everything you need is close at hand, Derrimut Shopping Centre, including the primary school, gardens, golf course, and public transport.

Description:
Contemporary Derrimut Gem is Dressed to Impress!
Awaiting you in this excellent Derrimut pocket is this stylish and contemporary 3 bedroom + study residence, which displays modern class and a versatile floorplan that first home buyers, young families, and keen investors will fall in love with. Surrounded by scenic reserves including Balmoral Park and close to St Lawrence Primary School, Derrimut PS, shops, golf course, and Western Freeway.
Accommodation: Daily and nightly comfort and modern style are taken care of with this smart and considered home, which is highlighted by a wonderful north-facing central living and meals zone which gets fabulous morning sun, formal lounge for all types of activities, dedicated study, kitchen with ample storage, breakfast bar, and stainless steel appliances, spacious master bedroom with a walk-in robe and dual vanity ensuite, other bedrooms with built-in robe storage, and a stylish central bathroom. You also have access to an undercover courtyard and garden for your outdoor enjoyment.
Features: Double remote garage, laundry with outdoor access, ducted heating, ceiling fans, solar hot water.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Stockdale Leggo Real Estate are proud to present 68 Capesthorne Drive Derrimut, a standout property that provides size, space, luxurious touches, a large side access to the rear and a magnificent outdoor entertaining space epitomising everything we desire when dreaming of a new family home. Highlighted by gorgeous Tasmanian Oak timber flooring, the modern and sophisticated interior comprises 4 spacious bedrooms, 2 sensational bathrooms including spa ensuite, 3 living areas and a separate study with the option to convert the study or one of the living spaces into a 5th bedroom. As good as the inside is the clincher will come when you step outside and start to picture all your future family gatherings and special occasions that this brilliantly designed rear yard will no doubt enhance creating those lifelong family memories you will cherish forever. Surrounded by lovely mature gardens are two (2) separate undercover entertainment areas, one with fireplace and cafÃ© blinds providing year round comfort and the other with built in BBQ and wood fire pizza oven, whilst the kids will absolutely love playing in the large grassed area and cubby house. Other standout features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 2x split systems, feature gas fireplace, high ceilings, front fence with electric gate, 3kw solar panel system, designer lighting, plantation shutters, alarm, storage shed, double garage with remote and so much more. Be quick to secure this special property, your family will absolutely love you for it.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Dartmouth Chase Derrimut, a more central position you would not find. A quiet family friendly street with only local traffic only enhances its prospects of becoming the ultimate location to raise your family, reward an investor with future capital growth or provide a great start for a First Home Buyer dipping their toes into the real estate market. On a great sized allotment of approx. 570sqm proudly stands this lovely home highlighted by the generous dimensions all rooms provide. A large central kitchen with stainless steel appliances and an abundance of bench and cupboard space overlooks the dining and main living area. Two sets of sliding doors to the alfresco combine all these areas forming a large indoor / outdoor entertaining space. This outdoor zone can be increased even further by replacing the window at the rear of the double remote garage with a rear roller door thus combining the garage with alfresco providing a huge undercover space to host the biggest and best of family gatherings whilst also providing easy access to the large rear yard. Sleeping quarters comprise master bedroom featuring massive WIR and ensuite with twin vanities and oversize shower, whilst the 2 remaining bedrooms with BIR's are serviced by the lovely main bathroom. A formal lounge ( or possible 4th bedroom conversion) and laundry with direct access to outside complete this home. Other features include ducted heating, freshly painted walls and ceilings, brand new carpets, ceiling fans, landscaped gardens, long driveway and fantastic lifestyle location with schools, parks, community centre, shops and transport all within walking distance of your front door. An affordable opportunity right in the heart of Derrimut awaits.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP
By renowned builder Porter Davis this huge double storey residence (approx. 42 squares) provides ample accommodation for the largest of families and represents by far the best value in Derrimut. ( Please have a look at the comparable sales on the Statement Of Information or prices being asked for other double storey homes in the area ). The home comprises 4 spacious bedrooms (2 with WIR'S, 2 with BIR'S) that are serviced by two sensational bathrooms with stone benches and oversize showers, a separate study or 5th bedroom and with six (6) living/entertaining zones you will never outgrow this one. By opening up the 2 bi-fold doors to the alfresco this property's unique design allows you to create an enormous entertaining space that incorporates the kitchen, dining, living, theatre/rumpus room, alfresco and and great sized backyard into one. Additional features include kitchen with stone bench tops, glass splashback, massive walk in pantry and 900mm appliances, enormous master bedroom with retreat area, ensuite and balcony, separate lounge room, magnificent hardwood staircase, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down lights, high ceilings, alarm, landscaped front and rear gardens with extensive concreting and decking , quality window furnishings including roman blinds, e/screens and blockouts, double garage with remote and internal access and so much more. Inspection highly recommended to appreciate exactly what is on offer.

Description:
Room for everybodyâ¦
Set in a great location and designed with a great floor plan this home offers everything you need to be comfortable. From the moment you walk in you will greeted by a large formal lounge leading past the study area towards the bright hostess kitchen with stainless steel appliances and ample storage which overlooks the dining/family area. Look a little further to the rumpus room which is great for movie nights. Complimenting this fantastic floorplan is the main bedroom with ensuite and W.I.R, whilst other bedrooms are serviced by a sparkling central bathroom with separate toilet. There is a list of great features including: double car garage with drive through access, decking, ducted heating, alarm and much more. All this situated in a great location of Derrimut with all amenities just moments away including schools, parklands, Derrimut Village Shopping Central, and easy access to the CBD via Western Ring Road. Call today for an inspection to avoid disappointment.

Description:
Better off in Bolton
Situated in a convenient pocket of Derrimut this property ticks all the boxes for all buyers out there in the marketplace. Close to YMCA Early learning centre, Good Start Early Learning, St Lawrence Primary School and Vic Uni Secondary College for all your educational needs. Transportation at a premium with Deer Park Train Station and a number of bus stops just around the corner, and the easy access to the freeway via Robinsons Road. Shopping's located down the road being Derrimut Village Shopping Centre with Coles and a number of speciality stores.
Sitting on a generous 584m2 (approx) allotment this property comprises of 4 spacious bedrooms with built in robes, master with walk in robe & ensuite, central bathroom and double car garage with drive through access leading to the spacious backyard with enough space for the kids to enjoy.
Don't miss your chance on this opportunity! Call today to book your inspection.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP
A prime central location walking distance to all amenities complimented by some great spaces both inside and out combine to present one lucky purchaser with a golden opportunity to secure an affordable home in this booming Derrimut market. Offering everything expected in a modern home, this residence comprises four (4) spacious bedrooms, the master bedroom with WIR and ensuite positioned to the front of the property and an additional three (3) good sized bedrooms to the rear serviced by the central main bathroom. As you enter you are greeted by a large lounge that moves through to the open plan kitchen / meals / living area. Outside is a huge alfresco area and great size backyard that the kids will love with a bonus rear roller door providing access to rear for storing extra cars, boats, caravans etc or for easy access to the large shed you may choose to erect (STCA). A double remote garage and huge laundry with direct access to outside completes the home. Other features include ducted heating, cooling, brand new carpets, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher in kitchen, landscaped gardens and large driveway for additional off street parking. This home screams value for money. Be quick this will not last long.

Description:
The Perfect Start
In this golden pocket of Derrimut we have a home you will want to be yours. Perfect for first home buyers, growing family or investors. Consisting of 4 bedrooms including a master with en-suite and walk in robe. A large open plan living area with adjoining meals area, bright kitchen with loads of cupboard space and stainless steel appliances, main bathroom and separate laundry. Walk out to a low maintenance rear yard perfect for entertaining all year round. Situated close to local park, Derrimut village shopping centre, recreational facilities, restaurants and a short drive to the western ring road giving easy access to the CBD.
This home includes:
- Four good size bedrooms
- Master with WIR and full ensuite.
- Huge living area with dining/meals arrangements adjoining to the kitchen.
- Two bathrooms.
- Decent size practical kitchen with enough cupboard space, pantry, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher etc.
- Ducted heating and split air conditioning.
- Laundry with enough space.
- Double remote garage with internal access to home and external excess to backyard.
